main event: A civilian in Cincinnati, Ohio reported seeing a single unidentified aerial object on August 8, 1966.
interesting points: The witness was a pilot, private license instructor, and astronomer with considerable experience in meteor watching and sighting.
The witness reported the sighting to the Daily Offer on August 8, 1966.
The object was described as a solid, sharply outlined object that appeared to stand still, changed brightness, and disappeared and reappeared intermittently.
The object was estimated to be approximately 60-100 feet in diameter and was observed for around 1 minute.
The witness drew a sketch of the object, which showed a curved, disc-shaped craft.
